page.title: 03DOUAI ABBEY
page.content: DOUAI ABBEY ORIGINATED IN PARIS ABOUT 1615 WHEN THE COMMUNITY FLED FROM ENGLAND.AFTER THE FRENCH GOVT.CONFISCATED THE ABBEYS THE COMMUNITY OF SAINTS MOVED BACK TO ENGLAND & TOOK OVER ST. MARY'S COLLEGE WOOLHAMPTON WHICH WAS OFFERED TO THEM BY THE BISHOP OF PORTSMOUTH.IN 1933 WORK WAS STARTED ON THE ABBEY WHICH WAS NEVER COMPLETED BECAUSE MONEY RAN OUT AFTER THE WAR.THE MONKS NEW LIVING QUARTERS WERE FINISHED IN L965.THE VIEW FROM THE TOP OF THE ABBEY IS MAGNIFICENT.THERE IS A PUBLIC SCHOOL IN ONE OF THE BEST PARTS OF THE COMPLEX,WITH AN ADJOINING SWIMMING POOL,SQUASH COURT AND RUGBY PITCH. THE ABBEY IS THE PARISH CHURCH FOR THE CATHOLICS OF BEENHAM.
